column3: No strong opinion, but looks good to me.\n
ACK (makes sense to remove duplicated parameter default values and the const pass by ref).\n

I'd prefer to take this one step further: remove the default arguments from the outer `CreateGenesisBlock` as well. And specify all the parameters where they belong, together, in the appropriate constructor.\n
I agree - I've updated the patch.  When it is finally reviewed and ready, I will squash the commits.\n
ut ACK. Agreed that the defaults there are strange.\n
